title: Week 10 Recap: Miracle in the Desert, Pats Upset Ravens, Winners and Losers | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
Kevin and Nora start by discussing Kyler Murray’s game-winning Hail Mary touchdown to DeAndre Hopkins to defeat the Buffalo Bills (2:45). Then they talk about the New England Patriots' Sunday-night upset win over the Baltimore Ravens (13:55). After that, they pick out their winners and losers (25:45) and answer a couple of listener questions (1:09:18)
Hosts: Kevin Clark and Nora Princiotti
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
